answers.answer: I completely understand. I am 26w3d and I am working 40+ hours a week on welbutrin for anxiety my gestational diabetes test just came back high so I have to go again I've already been seeing my ob every two weeks for like 6 weeks now and I have those flippin nightmares too. I never sleep! I feel like a freaking zombie

question: I'm so sick of having nightmares all the time and being so incredibly tired all the time. I'm Eighteen weeks tomorrow and I'm going crazy!Plus all the looking for the baby supplies is so stressful, how do you women do it???
title: Exhausted with Nightmares and a vent
